item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, February 18, 2025 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Scripton – Python IDE with Built-In Realtime Visualizations (78 points | 33 comments)
2. Tariffs result in 10% laptop price hike in U.S. says Acer CEO (97 points | 66 comments)
3. Show HN: Live-updating version of the 'What a week, huh?' meme (542 points | 101 comments)
4. Why I'm writing a Scheme implementation in 2025: Async Rust (70 points | 13 comments)
5. By the end of today, NASA's workforce will be about 10 percent smaller (78 points | 68 comments)
6. Grok3 Launch [video] (401 points | 780 comments)
7. My washing machine refreshed my thinking on software estimation (319 points | 287 comments)
8. Saying Goodbye to FFmpegKit (33 points | 4 comments)
9. Plane crashes, overturns during landing at Toronto airport (459 points | 529 comments)
10. I helped fix sleep-wake hangs on Linux with AMD GPUs (694 points | 187 comments)
11. 670nm red light exposure improved aged mitochondrial function, colour vision (249 points | 141 comments)
12. New technique generates topological structures with gravity water waves (41 points | 7 comments)
13. Jiga (YC W21) Is Hiring Mongo/React/Node Engineers ( | hide)
14. Nostalgia for Physical Media (6 points | 2 comments)
15. Sony FX-300 Jackal: A technological marvel of the late 70s (2021) (102 points | 34 comments)
16. On David Lynch's Revenge of the Jedi (2018) (215 points | 99 comments)
17. Why can't we remember our lives as babies or toddlers? (164 points | 185 comments)
18. Visualize Ownership and Lifetimes in Rust (181 points | 46 comments)
19. Reviewing the Cryptography Used by Signal (105 points | 59 comments)
20. A web platform for using YouTube as a drum sequencer (116 points | 17 comments)
21. Have you ever seen a goth downtown? (148 points | 64 comments)
22. Debugging an Undebuggable App (314 points | 49 comments)
23. Watch R1 "think" with animated chains of thought (240 points | 69 comments)
24. Launch HN: Roark (YC W25) – Taking the pain out of voice AI testing (57 points | 28 comments)
25. The Generative AI Con (258 points | 312 comments)
26. You're not a senior engineer until you've worked on a legacy project (2023) (718 points | 397 comments)
27. Why Quantum Cryptanalysis is Bollocks [pdf] (113 points | 82 comments)
28. Spacetime maps: A map that warps to show travel time (146 points | 24 comments)
29. Find Your 2%Ers (2023) (125 points | 35 comments)
30. Show HN: TimeRetain – A browser-based personal time tracker, no sign-up needed (42 points | 15 comments)
